All you have to do is link them together. If you have an‚Ä¶
data.text:
Passing along - Interesting article on Influencer Marketing broken into demographic audiences. Love to know your experiences about paid influencer marketing especially for those influencers under 200k followers. Ty https://lnkd.in/eg5UZ8PX

‚ÄúDon‚Äôt mistake politeness for lack of strength.‚Äù ‚Äî Sonia Sotomayor A little motivation and gentle reminder as we head off to a new week.

Sometimes a brand gets it. The L‚ÄôOreal ‚ÄúYou‚Äôre Worth It/I‚Äôm Worth It‚Äù campaign is feel good inspiration. https://lnkd.in/edV78HBY Backstory: https://lnkd.in/esUFxcNW Remember - You ARE Worth It üíõ

Traditional Art Or An IPad? Apple is apologizing for what many think is a controversial ad for the new IPad Pro. The ad shows art like music (a guitar a piano), books, and cans of paint being blown up; inference is they are no longer needed with the new IPad Pro features. Thoughts? https://lnkd.in/eY-pYgRJ #applead #ipod #technology #marketing

Will you be playing LinkedIn Games? ‚ÄúGames have officially arrived on LinkedIn. Taking a page from the New York Times‚Äô playbook, LinkedIn users can now play three games ‚Äì Pinpoint (a category guessing game), Crossclimb (a trivia game) and Queens (a riff on Sudoku) ‚Äì then discuss them on the platform. It‚Äôs an interesting attempt to get people coming back to the site and could signal a move beyond purely business content on the app.‚Äù - from PR Daily
